[download-url]: https://npmjs.org/package/dotgitconfig

> get .git/config as an object

## Installment

```bash
$ npm i dotgitconfig --save-dev
```

## Usage

```javascript
const dotgitconfig = require('dotgitconfig');
dotgitconfig(process.cwd());
```
